author: wddgit
body: Initial data files for the new schema evolution unit test. Soon, I will submit a PR containing the code for the new unit tests. It would be best if this PR was not merged until the unit test PR is reviewed and approved. The data files should be merged at the same time as or before the unit test PR is merged. I'll add a link to the other PR in a comment here as soon as the other PR is submitted.
title: Initial data files for schema evolution unit test
